function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate hospital design and adaptability to emerging problems may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Higher infection rates and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement modular and quick building strategies, prioritize open-access design, and ensure strong human-factor concepts in hospital design","Technologies":"Modular construction, advanced building materials, and adaptable design software","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, healthcare facility managers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Climate change contributes to the global spread and redistribution of communicable infections","Impact":"Increased emergence and distribution of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Address climate change, prioritize sustainable building practices, and implement adaptive design strategies","Technologies":"Green building technologies, sustainable materials, and climate-resilient infrastructure","People":"Global population, communities in unstable climates","Owner":"Environmental agencies, architects, builders, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor environmental quality (IAQ) in built environments can raise human exposure to viral infections such as SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Higher risk of viral infections and adverse health effects on inhabitants","Mitigation":"Improve IAQ through effective ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and sustainable building practices","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filtration systems, air quality sensors, and energy-efficient HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of buildings and public health authorities","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"}]}
